title: Saint Peter Roast
description: è‹± You know, the tale of Saint Peter is a damn comedy gold mine. This guy was Jesus' main man, part of the holy entourage. But during the big trial, Pete pulls a disappearing act not once, not twice, but three times! Jesus must've been like, "Seriously, bro? We break bread together and this is how you do me?"
